name: Psychic (itch) (LemonMaster66)
description:
Psychic is about the main characters adventure on why he has been having so many nightmares lately...

in doing so you must go through many horror like dreams to find the source of your nightmares as you make your decent into... The    m   e   a   t

btw it says attempt 2 because this is my second time making it... (Always remember to back up your games!)

pretty much the whole game was made in a series of devlogs on my YT channel: LemonMaster66

you can view the creation of the current version of the game here where I smushed together a month of game dev into 14 mins of video:
